user.title: Connect to UNAS Pro
user.description: Enter your UNAS Pro SSH credentials and MQTT broker details. Root access is required to install monitoring scripts.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to UNAS Pro. Please check the IP address and credentials.
error.timeout_connect: Connection timed out. Please check that SSH is enabled on your UNAS Pro.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs.

abort.already_configured: This UNAS Pro is already configured.
abort.mqtt_required: MQTT integration must be installed and configured before setting up UNAS Pro. Please add the MQTT integration first, then try again.
